title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.3 - Individual and business entity statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.3 - Individual and business entity statement

State Regulations

Where the applicant is an individual, the application
shall be accompanied by an individual statement on form GC-103; where the
applicant is a firm, partnership, organization, association, joint venture or
any business entity other than a corporation, it shall be accompanied by a
business entity statement on form GC-104. Each person named in form GC-104
shall file an individual statement on form GC-103. For corporations, see
section
4607.4
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.3

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
